The correct chronological order is: (1) A man says "Courtside RV show" while the smiling couple stands in a tented area. (2) A woman describes Quartzsite as the largest RV gathering as aerial shots show a massive white tent and many RVs. (3) Thomas Grossman introduces European Motorhome Tours at a booth with brochures and maps. (4) A demonstrator explains a waterless, self-contained composting toilet while pointing inside it. (5) A woman demonstrates blue silicone stretch lids and mentions they are dishwasher/microwave safe.

Therefore, the answer is option B: 2 -> 1 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5.

The correct chronological order is: (1) A man describes a step-through e-bike with improved motor power. (2) Another man mentions remote dimmable balloon lights that create soft area light. (3) A representative promotes guided RV tours across the US/Canada/Alaska and references adventurecaravans.com. (4) A man from a solar company explains design/installation and emphasizes educating customers beside panels and equipment. (5) A vendor explains luxury shower heads that increase pressure and use vitamin C to neutralize chlorine. (6) Tricia Speer explains camp host duties for a recreation resource company while standing by an RV. (7) A man at the Americas Mailbox booth describes mail forwarding for those domiciled in South Dakota.

Therefore, the answer is B: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6 -> 7.
